name: DNR
description: DNR is a game about a man who has been experimented on by the government and kept alive to continue testing. He has finally broken out and will slowly bleedout due to the experiments if the doctors don't keep him alive,however this is exactly what he wants.....Death. He longs for the suffering and experimentation to end therefore the objective of this game is to gun down any who would want to heal you and keep you alive. WASD or arrow keys to move left click to shoot, hope you enjoy:)
